Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation when facing only 1 enemy
upon the character's entry*
- {passiveImg:once}{passiveImg:forever}Ki +3
- {passiveImg:once}{passiveImg:forever}ATK & DEF 180%{passiveImg:up_g}
*Basic effect(s)*
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (AGL
excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres
*For every Ki Sphere obtained*
- ATK & DEF 50%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 500%)
*1 or more AGL Ki Spheres obtained, or 5 or more Ki Spheres
obtained*
- Damage reduction rate 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 18%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When attacking*
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Damage reduction rate 18%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional Super Attack when HP is 50% or
more
*If HP is 50% or less at the end of turn*
- {passiveImg:forever}DEF 50%{passiveImg:up_g}
- High chance of performing a critical hit
*After performing 5 or more Super Attacks in battle*
- {passiveImg:once}Changes Ki Spheres: All to AGL
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (AGL
excluded) to AGL Ki Spheres

5859.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK, raises DEF and 
causes immense damage to enemy
